mapper.select: select * from member order by member_id desc;
mapper.insert: insert into member(id, nickname, pwd, username, email, team_id) values(#{id}, #{nickname}, #{pwd}, #{username}, #{email}, #{team_id})
mapper.update: update member set id=#{id}, nickname=#{nickname}, pwd=#{pwd}, username=#{username}, email=#{email}, team_id=#{team_id} where member_id=#{member_id}
update member set level_id=#{level_id} where member_id=#{member_id}
